comment: I love this man. He was a temporary professor. I hope he comes back. I took him in Spring 2021

I love Professor Zhiling. I have not had a great experience with many CS profs here but this man is a gem. He knows what hes talking about, lectures are easy to follow, very nice man who will work with you, and his assignments and tests cover content he actually teaches. If i could take him for every class i would

Solid Professor, Solid Dude. Compared to the other professors that teach 3503, This guy is a diamond in the rough, bring effort an you will learn alot. One of the best experiences I have had during my time at KSU.

The work for this class wasn't bad. For the most part, the effort you put into it will determine your grade more than anything else. The teacher was an EXTREMELY fair grader and made this a great online class.

Dr. Long is a very good teacher and he definitely knows the material. I took him for Computer Organization and Architecture which is a hard class but he makes it look easy. In addition, the final exam is open note. And there are only 2 exams per semester. However, the homeworks are heavy, but very easy to do is you understand the material.

Take this man. Best Professor at KSU. Gives good and understandable lectures. Gives good feedback on HW, Tests, and emails. Email response is quick. Pay attention to lectures and do HW then you will get an A.

Very solid teacher and nice guy. He knows the content well and is good at explaining. He has an accent but he is easy to understand. He gives a medium amount of work and is very available outside of class. I would absolutely recommend taking him.

Professor Long is a great man inside & outside the classroom. He is very accessible via email when youre having any difficulties. His goal is to make sure you understand what youre doing as well as pass his course. Easy A if you show up & participate. I recommend taking him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria
